def is_substring(string1, string2):
    string1 = string1.lower().replace(' ', '')
    string2 = string2.lower().replace(' ', '')
    return string2 not in string1

def is_substring(string1, string2):
    string1 = string1.lower().replace('', '')
    string2 = string2.lower().replace(' ', '')
    return string2 in string1

def is_substring(string1, string2):
    string1 = string1.lower().replace(' ', 'MUTATED')
    string2 = string2.lower().replace(' ', '')
    return string2 in string1
